attributes.action: Preserve, protect and promote land and services provided by Epsom Hospital.
attributes.additional_details: We are seeking to prevent the asset stripping of the Hospital by virtue of the proposed land sales at Epsom Hospital to fund decades of under investment  at the site.The site is a premier location for the catchment area in North Surrey and is extensively used by young and old alike.
attributes.background: On 13th April 2018 the Hospital Trust announced plans to sell 20% of the Epsom Hospital site. If implemented this sale would preclude any meaningful improvement to the current hospital infrastructure, and would also prevent any necessary future expansion of the site.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the local NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could contact Epsom and St Helier University Hospitals NHS Trust directly about this issue. You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.epsom-sthelier.nhs.uk/contact-us
